page.title: 19THEALE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The only organised club for teenagers in the area and in Theale village is the Youth Club which meets at Theale Green School. The Club has a junior section for those up to 13 years old and a senior section for those between 13-18. The junior Club is open on Tuesday and Thursday evenings and the senior section meets on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Special activities are sometimes arranged for the weekends. The Club has its own snooker table, table-tennis equipment, pin-ball machines and darts board. As well as arranging a regular round of discoteques, live concerts and general activity evenings, the Club leaders have organised special events such as a night walk along the Ridgeway and international exchanges with young people in Berlin, Amsterdam and Copenhagen.
